channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Oklahoma, Role-Playing Battles Borrow From the Russia-Ukraine War

item.title: In a county that backed Trump, people depend on Medicaid and are conflicted about cuts

item.title: Trump vs. Harvard
item.description: Inside the president’s battle with the university.

item.description: I’ve seen the signs before. I’m seeing them now.

item.title: 'We're in a holding pattern': Home sales and building slump in the face of uncertainty
item.description: Would-be homebuyers are finding lots of reasons to wait.

item.title: At Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Trial, Testimony About a Break-in at Kid Cudi’s Home

item.title: Turkey Cracks Down on Fliers Who Stand Up Too Soon, Threatening Fines
item.description: As of this month, passengers who stand before planes fully stop may be fined by the Turkish government.

item.title: Joël Le Scouarnec, French Doctor Who Molested Hundreds of Children, Is Sentenced
item.description: A former surgeon confessed to abusing at least 299 people, mostly children, in what is considered the largest case of its kind in French history.

item.title: Japan Welcomes a New Sumo Champ. Surprise: He’s Japanese.
item.description: Onosato Daiki became the first Japanese man in eight years to be named a yokozuna, or grand champion, the highest title in the sport.
